Body:
sampler.set_sampler(sampler_name='mock_sampler')
mock_taus = [20000, 40000, 80000, 100000]
for mock_tau in mock_taus:
    sampler.set_sampler_value('mock_tau', mock_tau)
    sampler.measure(number_of_waveforms=4, emitting_frequency=10, auto_mode
        =True)
    while sampler.is_measuring:
        time.sleep(0.1)
    result = sampler.query()
    self.assertTrue(result.tau >= 10000)
    sampler.measure(number_of_waveforms=4, emitting_frequency=0.5,
        auto_mode=True)
    while sampler.is_measuring:
        time.sleep(0.1)
    result = sampler.query()
    diff_ratio = abs(result.tau - mock_tau) / mock_tau
    self.assertTrue(diff_ratio <= 0.01)
